_comment: VERSIONING RULES: Bot V.DDMM.HOTFIX[TYPE]-YY | TYPE: a (Alpha) > b (Beta) > s (Stable). HOTFIX: 1.0.0 or more progressive.

history.logs: Code Consolidation: Merged reminder and timezone commands into 'Utility_slash.py' for better organization. Maintenance: Localized 'reset_bot.py' with dynamic language support (FR/EN) and fixed JSON initialization logic.
Reminder System: Added per-user timezone support (/reminder timezone set) and absolute time parsing (e.g., 18:30). Confirmations now use Discord dynamic timestamps for better clarity across devices.

Launcher UX: Added real-time download speed and progress percentage display for dependency installation (FFmpeg & Node.js). Enhanced the 'run.py' bootstrap script for better feedback during first-time setup.

Reminder System: Added '/reminder' command for personal tasks. Features include customizable time (10m, 1h, 2d), persistent storage in JSON, optional recurring alerts (spam) until acknowledged via button, and configurable delivery (Channel or DM).

Universal Stability: Enabled local download-first strategy for all platforms (YouTube, SoundCloud, etc.) to eliminate buffering. FFmpeg Elite: Optimized with multi-threading (-threads 0), fast probing, and silent logging for smooth performance. UI & UX: Fixed '/leave' localization, restored 'Stop' button embed deletion, and implemented real-time progress bar sync for pause/resume and song completion.

AudioPlayer Overhaul: Implemented 'Smart Previous' (restarts song if >5s or finished), fixed TikTok/local file seeking bug, and enabled persistent UI messages (embed only replaced on new tracks). Maintenance & Safety: Added universal exit listener for download cleanup (handles kicks/timeouts), enhanced 'reset_bot.py' with directory structure recreation, and fully rebranded music cog to 'AudioPlayer'.
